info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 21 at 9:49PM CDT until March 22 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. Snowfall rates will reach 1 to 2 inches per hour at times. Drifting snow, patchy blowing snow, and freezing drizzle are expected in addition to heavy snow. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northwest and west central Minnesota and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Heavy snow rates will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday early morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
